You opened Talking Caller. For instruction press the menu button

You opened Talking Caller. Instruction, Slide from top or bottom to scroll over the list, tap the screen once to hear the name of the contact, tap the same location on the screen to call, click the menu button for speed settings
Click the bottom left screen to edit the settings or bottom right for other instructions
Saved your preferences. Back to your contact List
Canceled your preferences. Back to your contact List
Tap the top to call %1s or bottom to cancel.
Start calling %1s
Call canceled. Back to your contact List
I am testing the speed of my voice
Speed Up. I am testing the speed of my voice
Speed Down. I am testing the speed of my voice
This is the slowest i can go
This is the fastest i can go

Instruction.
Slide from top or bottom to scroll over the list.
Tap the screen once to hear the name of the contact.
Tap the same location on the screen to call. 
Tap the bottom of the screen to go back to your contact list

Instruction.
Slide from top or bottom to scroll over the list.
Tap the screen once to hear the name of the contact.
Tap the same location on the screen to call. 
Tap the bottom of the screen to go back to your contact list
Back to your contact List
Preferences. Are you visually impaired? Tap the top if yes and i would provide a special preferences screen for you.
Speed Settings. Click the top to speed up the voice, middle to make it slower, bottom left to save and bottom right to cancel
Canceled the speed settings, now back to your contact list
Saved your speed settings, now back to your contact list
Default Speech Language
Default Speech Rate
Listen to preview
Default Text Language
Talking Caller Id
(Default) Applications will speak the name/number of the incoming call
Applications will not speak the name/number of the incoming call
Read SMS
(Default) Applications will read the incoming SMS
Applications will not read the incoming SMS
Language Settings.\n Tap the top to change language. Tap the bottom left to go the speed settings. Tap the bottom right to go back to your contact list
Call Ended
%1s has ended the call
%1s is calling
